preqs: OHS1000, DWG1201 or DWG1301 or DWG1103

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {DWG1103, DWG1201, DWG1301} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {OHS1000})

description: Social based strategies is a studio based drawing unit. Students will be presented with projects introducing themes of the city, architecture, mass media and politics as an investigative drawing practice.The unit provides students with the means to achieve a level of technical competence in these processes, and a consideration of their works in the context of historical, philosophical and contemporary practices.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
